definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
variant of 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1]/camera

sentences.english: A radiographic marker is received within the sealed inorganic metallic cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 在所述密封的無機金屬圓筒內置入射線照像標記物。

sentences.english: The photographic elements contain a blue-sensitive hydrophilic colloid silver halide emulsion layer.
sentences.chinese: 照像材料含有親水膠體的感藍鹵化銀滷劑層。

sentences.english: Use the tape to fix the pin to the camera's lens.
sentences.chinese: 使用帶子把別針安裝到照像機的透鏡上。

sentences.english: Macrographic method of showing and describing the chemical heterogeneity of effervescent steel wire rod.
sentences.chinese: 沸騰鋼線材化學雜質成分及使其顯示的顯微照像法。

sentences.english: Their morphological characteristics were described in Chinese and Latin with microscopical photo plates.
sentences.chinese: 其形態特徵有漢文和拉丁文描述以及顯微照像圖版。

sentences.english: Hz was shot with a spy camera that was placed inside the artist's mouth.
sentences.chinese: 赫茲在藝術家的嘴裏面安置的一架間諜照像機拍攝的。

sentences.english: After five yea of hard work, he'd saved enough money to buy a new camera.
sentences.chinese: 他辛費力苦積攢了五年的錢買了一架照像機。

sentences.english: Yes. The camera was handed in to the purser.
sentences.chinese: 是的，照像機已上交到事務長那裏了。

sentences.english: After imaging study, the mice were sacrificed and underwent autoradiography .
sentences.chinese: 之後將老鼠犧牲，進行自動放射照像。

sentences.english: In appending to window, the sunlight still just brights on ray to be favor Yi snow via the blind side.
sentences.chinese: 窗外，陽光還是在透過縫隙把光線照像伊雪。

sentences.english: Here, our families can sit for a portrait in a private setting, without any inhibition.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，每個家庭因是私人的照像而毫無顧忌。

sentences.english: An Atlantic walrus bellows toward the camera near Igloolik, Nunavut, Canada.
sentences.chinese: 格盧利克附近，一頭大西洋海象衝着照像機吼叫。

definition: variant of 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1]/camera
camera (abbr. for 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1])/at the opportune moment/as the circumstances allow
to take a picture or video of oneself/to take a selfie/selfie
variant of 錄像|录像[lu4 xiang4]
to enlarge color photos/color film processing
head-and-shoulders photo (esp. a formal one used in a passport, ID card etc)
